TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GetPageCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

MemberSignature.Value: public GetPageCompletedEventArgs (System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage page, int pageNumber, Exception error, bool cancelled, object userState);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage page, int32 pageNumber, class System.Exception error, bool cancelled, object userState) cil managed

Docs.param: The exception that occurred during the asynchronous operation; or NULL if there were no errors.
`true` if the asynchronous operation was canceled; otherwise, `false`.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs"> class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The asynchronous operation can be canceled by calling <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A>.

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"> for the page specified in the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A>.
Docs.value: The document page for the page specified in the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> property identifies the page number of the requested DocumentPage.

Docs.summary: Gets the page number passed to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs.DocumentPage%2A> property contains the document page for the requested PageNumber.
